summary: Adds a new follower named Tasha Steel, She can be found in her camp near Riverwood. She is skilled in light armor, one handed, sneak, and archery. Has the perks Ranger, Quickshot, and Lightfoot.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a new follower named Tasha Steel, She can be found in her camp near Riverwood. She is skilled in light armor, one handed, sneak, and archery. Has the perks Ranger, Quickshot, and Lightfoot.

If you wish to marry her put player.setrelationshiprank 28001840 4 in the console and your good to go.

On steam workshop:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12839


If you haven\'t already you should download the Fixed Followers Light mod, it fixes the inability to give Her bows.

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9842
author: Vecend
